full_summary:
=====================================

**Title:** Pacific Region Analytical Services Standing Offer Agreement

**Contract Number:** MX-43004969428

**Amendment Number:** 5

**Solicitation Number:** PR23SOA1_SC81779

**Publication Date:** January 15, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** March 7, 2024, at 17:00:00

**Description:**
Defense Construction Canada is soliciting bids for a Standing Offer Agreement to provide laboratory testing services for the Canadian Armed Forces and other government departments. The agreement will cover a period of two years, with a maximum estimated value of $350,000. The contract may be extended for up to two additional one-year periods, with a maximum value increase of $175,000 for each period.

**Scope of Work:**
The successful bidder will be required to provide a range of laboratory testing services, including:

* Metals analysis (CCME and CSR metals)
* VOC and BTEX analysis
* Petrochemical analysis (F1 and F2-F4 hydrocarbons)
* Leachable and extractable analysis (TCLP and EPHs)
* Total mercury and hexavalent chromium analysis
* Pesticide and persistent organic pollutant analysis (CCME and BC CSR guidelines)
* Total cyanide, dissolved metals, and phosphorus analysis
* Water quality analysis (pH, TSS, dissolved metals, etc.)

**Trade Agreements:**
This solicitation is open to bidders who meet the eligibility criteria under the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

**Bid Submission:**
Bidders must submit their proposals electronically through the MERX system by the closing date and time. Late submissions will not be accepted.

**Contact Information:**
For questions and concerns, please contact Michael Morris at michael.morris@dcc-cdc.gc.ca or 250-508-4457.

**Notice URL:**
The solicitation notice and documents are available at: https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2758103574/abstract?language=EN and https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2758103574/abstract?language=FR.
